edu.washington.apl.aganse.dataTools
Class DataPlotWindow

java.lang.Object
  edu.washington.apl.aganse.dataTools.DataPlotWindow
Direct Known Subclasses:
DepthDataPlotWindow
public class DataPlotWindow
extends java.lang.Object

Displays the dataseries in a graphical, interactive plot window. Currently uses the PtPlot component from PtolemyII (Berkeley), v2.0, with some modifications by me and Pete Brodsky (APL-UW) as found in package edu.washington.apl.aganse.ptolemyUpdates.

Version:
18 Sep 2015 (initial version 25 Oct 2002)
Author:
Andy Ganse,
Applied Physics Laboratory,
University of Washington.
See Also:
DepthDataPlotWindow
